title: You can't be real about this?
body:
I've had some shitty internet connection yesterday. I joined a game and I had some extream lagg spikes, then it forze and said "attempting to reconnect" after this I tried to fix my internet and joined a new game. This time the exact same thing happend so i shut of my computer for the day and now that i logg in YOU WANT ME TO WAIT 20 GOD DAMN MINUTES FOR 1 MATCH? Are you beeing serious? What are you thinking riot? There's nothing I could've done  to change this and I even wrote to my team before i dced both times that my internet is fucking up (while the extream laggs) and that i most likley am going to dc. I shouldn't be punished because a few kids getting butthurt over something I couldn't control! FIX THIS!
// GuardinGates

replies.body:
Regardless of your intent, a disconnection like this will still negatively impact *everyone in the match*. This is a big reason why disconnections are all treated equally and why we cannot modify or remove penalties for any reason. Additionally, these penalties don't come up for a single leave, it actually takes a trend of disconnecting before you see this penalty.

I'd recommend addressing your disconnections by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League. Let me know if they caused any noticeable change for you.

First of all, I'm not trying to start an argument but how are they supposed to fix YOUR internet.. I mean, it's your internet... By to the way, I've had some insane lag spikes aswell. I'm asking, have you downloaded the alpha client? If so, have you used it and then afterwards recieved lag spikes? Have you experienced this situation before the alpha client?

I had some lag spikes after downloading the alpha client so I think thats the problem. (tbh I kinda agree with that 20 minute part, that's seriously bs.. just too much).

You can check your firewall and internet and see what's the problem. I usually exit all unnecessary application during playing a league of legends match, such as google chrome or spotify et.c. That lowers atleast a little bit of lag. 

Willing to hear from you soon! Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
